header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack software engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable analytics and insights platforms that transform complex data into actionable business intelligence. Proven expertise in developing enterprise-grade data visualization dashboards, high-performance backend services, and robust APIs using .NET, React, and Azure cloud services. Passionate about creating data-driven solutions that drive automation and optimization decisions for global organizations.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected an enterprise analytics and insights platform serving Disney+ and Hulu, processing 50M+ daily events through interactive dashboards and data visualizations that transformed complex streaming data into actionable business intelligence, reducing reporting cycles from weeks to hours.

Developed high-throughput data processing pipelines using AWS Kinesis and Spark that analyze 10M+ real-time streaming events daily, powering automated insights for A/B testing, content performance tracking, and financial revenue attribution across globally distributed teams.

Optimized cloud-based data lakes storing 500TB+ of subscriber and viewing data in AWS S3 with Deltalake support, improving query performance and enabling real-time business intelligence for ML-powered personalization and revenue forecasting models.

Created automated schema-based code generation platform that standardized data access across analytics applications developed in Scala, Java, and Python, reducing development time by 80% while ensuring data consistency and high availability through comprehensive monitoring and CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed a proof-of-stake blockchain platform enabling enterprise customers to verify sustainable and ethical supply chains through automated tracking of goods and services, providing real-time transparency and compliance insights.

Implemented high-performance search and analytics APIs using MongoDB indexing and Protobuf serialization, enabling sub-second query responses for complex supply chain analytics dashboards and automated business intelligence reporting.

Maintained platform stability and data integrity across globally distributed blockchain nodes developed with Akka actors, ensuring high availability and automated validation of sustainability claims for enterprise supply chain management systems.
Designed and implemented a blockchain key storage solution in React to improve accessibility for non-technical users, improving access for business partners.

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed an Angular web application integrating multiple .NET backend microservices for tracking submittals, information requests, and issues, providing a unified dashboard interface for construction teams to manage complex workflows and automated business processes.

Implemented an event-sourced change order management system using Event Store for data storage and a microservice architecture, enabling real-time tracking of project modifications with complete audit trails and business intelligence reporting.
Created interactive data visualizations and performance dashboards that transformed complex project data into accessible business intelligence for architects, project managers, and subcontractors.
Structured and defined data storage for complex use-cases using database engines including MSSQL, PostgreSQL, object storage, and Redis hosted in Azure to ensure high availability.

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed a comprehensive automated API and UI testing framework ensuring high availability and reliability of analytics and business intelligence systems serving enterprise construction clients.

Executed a daily automated testing pipeline that published real-time results and performance metrics to Azure DevOps dashboards, providing continuous insights into system health and quality analytics for development teams.
Built automated monitoring and reporting systems delivering actionable insights on test coverage, system performance, and quality metrics through integrated dashboard solutions.
Designed automated and manual test cases ensuring all application interaction paths are monitored and tracked for functionality regressions.
